Surface Preview Pane (LabVIEW MathScript Window)

Requires: MathScript RT Module

This pane appears in the Preview Pane field of the LabVIEW MathScript Window. Select Surface from the Display Type pull-down menu to display this pane.

Note  The Display Type pull-down menu appears only after you select a variable from the Variable List.

Use this pane to plot data on a 3D surface graph.

This pane includes the following components:

  • 3D style—Specifies the type of 3D graph to display.
  • Names—Specifies the names of the variable to display.
